mapper.select: SELECT MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM, MANAGEMENT_POST_TITLE, MANAGEMENT_POST_CONTENT, MANAGEMENT_POST_ID, POSTED_AT,MANAGEMENT_POST_RELPY FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM, MANAGEMENT_POST_TITLE, MANAGEMENT_POST_CONTENT, MANAGEMENT_POST_ID, POSTED_AT,MANAGEMENT_POST_RELPY FROM (SELECT MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM, MANAGEMENT_POST_TITLE, MANAGEMENT_POST_CONTENT, MANAGEMENT_POST_ID, POSTED_AT,MANAGEMENT_POST_RELPY FROM TB_MANAGEMENT_POST ORDER BY MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM DESC)) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{selectedNum} * 10) - 9 AND #{selectedNum} * 10

SELECT MANAGEMENT_POST_TITLE, MANAGEMENT_POST_CONTENT, MANAGEMENT_POST_ID, MANAGEMENT_POST_RELPY,MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM,POSTED_AT FROM TB_MANAGEMENT_POST WHERE MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM = #{management_post_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MANAGEMENT_POST SET MANAGEMENT_POST_TITLE = #{management_post_title}, MANAGEMENT_POST_CONTENT = #{management_post_content}, POSTED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE MANAGEMENT_POST_NUM = #{management_post_num}
